name: Though Choice For Y-Man
description:
Thanks for visiting my gamepage.

This game is my game, created for the GameDev.TV Community Jam of may 2022.

Some info about the game

Theme was "Death is only the beginning".

I created a small variation on pacman with a little twist. See for yourself.

https://sharemygame.com/@Ss0oNnNnYy/though-choice-for-y-man (WegGL Build screwed up some sprite locations but it is playable :-) )

Played with Arrow keys.

Btw, if you find 5 mins, please comment with your findings.. It will give me insights to improve for my next games :-)

PS: SPOILER ALERT!! The red pacman has some AI issues and could use some polishing :-) I'll work on it after feedback. Also sound is not great but it's a start ;-)
